avgh.DESC: Averege over the whole analysed {s_units} history

seas.DESC: Repetitions from {s_n1} to {s_n1} {s_units} looking back and weighting {s_n2} periods (older is less important)

sea2.DESC: Repetitions from {s_n1} to {s_n1} {s_units} averaged with repetitions from {s_n2} to {s_n2} {s_units} over 2 past periods

sea4.DESC: Repetitions from {s_n1} to {s_n1} {s_units} averaged with repetitions from {s_n2} to {s_n2} {s_units} over 4 past periods

lin2.DESC: Continuation of last {s_n2} {s_units} trend using {s_n1} back periods each with {s_n2} {s_units}

lin3.DESC: Continuation of last {s_n2} {s_units} trend using {s_n1} back periods each with {s_n2} {s_units}
